proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43141

1THESS 2.13 duþe jah weis awiliudom guda unsweibandans, unte nimandans at uns waurd hauseinais gudis andnemuþ ni swaswe waurd manne, ak swaswe ist sunjaba waurd gudis, þatei jah waurkeiþ in izwis juzei galaubeiþ.
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43142

1THESS 2.14 jus auk galeikondans waurþuþ, broþrjus, aikklesjom gudis þaim wisandeim in Iudaia in Xristau Iesu, unte þata samo wunnuþ jah jus fram izwaraim inkunjam swaswe jah weis fram Iudaium, 1THESS 2.15 þaiei jah fraujin usqemun Iesua jah swesaim praufetum jah uns frawrekun jah guda ni galeikandans jah allaim mannam andaneiþans sind, 1THESS 2.16 warjandans uns du þiudom rodjan ei ganisaina, akei du usfulljan seinos frawaurhtins sinteino;
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43143
aþþan snauh ana ins hatis gudis und andi.
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43144
1THESS 2.17 aþþan weis, broþrjus, gaainaidai af izwis du mela ƕeilos, andwairþja ni hairtin, ufarassau sniumidedum andaugi izwar gasaiƕan in managamma lustau.
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43145
1THESS 2.18 unte wildedum qiman at izwis, ik raihtis Pawlus jah ainamma sinþa jah twaim, jah analatida uns Satana.
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43146
1THESS 2.19 ƕa auk ist unsara wens aiþþau faheþs aiþþau waips ƕoftuljos, niu jus in andwairþja fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus in is quma?
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43147
1THESS 2.20 jus auk siuþ wulþus unsar jah faheþs.
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43148
1THESS 3.1 In þizei ju ni usþulandans þanamais, galeikaida uns ei biliþanai weseima in Aþeinim ainai.
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43149

1THESS 3.2 jah insandidedum Teimauþaiu, broþar unsarana jah andbaht gudis in aiwaggeljon Xristaus, ei izwis gatulgjai jah bidjai bi galaubein izwara, 1THESS 3.3 ei ni ainshun afagjaidau in þaim aggwiþom;
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43150
silbans auk wituþ þatei du þamma satidai sijum.
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43151
1THESS 3.4 jah auk þan wesum at izwis, fauraqeþum izwis þatei anawairþ was uns du winnan agliþos, swaswe jah warþ jah wituþ.
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43152
1THESS 3.5 duþþe jah ik ju ni usþulands insandida du ufkunnan galaubein izwara, ibai aufto usfaifraisi izwis sa fraisands jah sware wairþai arbaiþs unsara.
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43153

1THESS 3.6 aþþan nu at qimandin Teimauþaiu at unsis fram izwis jah gateihandin uns galaubein jah friaþwa izwara, jah þatei gaminþi unsar habaiþ god sinteino, gairnjandans uns gasaiƕan, swaswe jah weis izwis, 1THESS 3.7 inuh þis gaþrafstidai sijum, broþrjus, fram izwis ana allai nauþai jah aglon unsarai in izwaraizos galaubeinais;
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43154
1THESS 3.8 unte sai libam, jabai jus gastandiþ in fraujin.
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43155

1THESS 3.9 ƕa auk awiliude magum usgildan guda bi izwis ana allai fahedai þizaiei faginom in izwara faura guda unsaramma, 1THESS 3.10 naht jah daga ufarassau bidjandans ei gasaiƕaima andwairþja izwara jah ustiuhaima waninassu galaubeinais izwaraizos?
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43156
1THESS 3.11 aþþan silba guþ jah atta unsar jah frauja unsar Iesus Xristus garaihtjai wig unsarana du izwis.
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43157

1THESS 3.12 aþþan izwis frauja managjai jah ganohnan gataujai friaþwai in izwis misso jah allans swaswe jah weis in izwis, 1THESS 3.13 du tulgjan hairtona izwara unfairinona in weihiþai faura guda jah attin unsaramma in quma fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus miþ allaim þaim weiham seinaim.
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43158
1THESS 4.1 þannu nu, broþrjus, anahaitam bidai izwis jah bidjam in fraujin Iesua, ei swaswe andnemuþ at uns ƕaiwa skuluþ gaggan jah galeikan guda, swa jah gaggaiþ jah gaaukaiþ mais.
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43159
1THESS 4.2 wituþ auk ƕarjos anabusnins atgebum izwis þairh fraujan Iesu Xristu.
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43160

1THESS 4.3 þata auk ist wilja gudis, weihiþa izwara, ei gahabaiþ izwis af kalkinassau, 1THESS 4.4 ei witi ƕarjizuh izwara gastaldan sein kas in weihiþai jah sweriþai, 1THESS 4.5 ni in gairunja lustaus, swaswe jah þiudos þozei ni kunnun guþ, 1THESS 4.6 ei ƕas ni ufargaggai nih bi faihu _ol_ broþar seinana, unte fraweitands frauja ist allaize, swaswe jah fauraqeþum izwis jah weitwodidedum.
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43161
1THESS 4.7 unte ni laþoda uns guþ du unhrainiþai, ak in weihiþa.
proiel:20170214:gothic-nt:43162
1THESS 4.8 inuh þis nu saei ufbrikiþ, ni mann ufbrikiþ, ak guda, saei gaf ahman seinana weihana izwis.
